mapper.select: select * from route where userId = #{userId} and aircraftId = #{aircraftId} order by sequence
mapper.insert: insert into route(userId, aircraftId, fromAirport, departureTime,departureDay, toAirport, arrivalTime,arrivalDay, sequence) values (#{userId},#{aircraftId},#{fromAirport},#{departureTime},#{departureDay},#{toAirport},#{arrivalTime},#{arrivalDay},#{sequence})
mapper.select: select * from route order by aircraftId,sequence
mapper.delete: delete from route where userId = #{userId} and aircraftId = #{aircraftId}
